snippet: CUNY is making a push this year for its students to register to vote, to follow the city campaigns, and even to work at polling sites.
abstract: Trailside blog; City University of New York, hoping to turn its large and diverse student body into force at polls, is planning all-out effort to pester, needle and coax its students into voting.
lead_paragraph: CUNY is making a push this year for its students to register to vote, to follow the city campaigns, and even to work at polling sites.

headline.main: Learn Campus, Meet Dorm Neighbors, Get Ready to Vote
headline.print_headline:
CUNY Pushing
Its Students to Vote
